Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2016 01:59PM dumankd wrote: Thank you for all the information. I am trying to stay strong but not knowing anyhting for sure is really make me nervous.
Posts.Title: Breastfeeding and confirmed an irregular lesion in my breast dumankd windingshores

Posts.Content: dumankd wrote: I noticed a lump in my breast last month but I was not worried since I have been breastfeeding. But it got bigger. My sister was diagnosed with breast cancer when she was 40 (negative for the gene testing) and I am 36. After ultrasound they find an lesion with ill defined borders and size measuring 1.3 x 0.8 x 0.9 . I'll have a biopsy with a needle next tuesday and I am so worried. Does anybody have any similar experience. Any comment is appreciated.Thanks a lot. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breastfeeding and confirmed an irregular lesion in my breast dumankd windingshores
